column1: CITATION also require no labeled data or hand-labeled seeds for their namedentity extractor

column1: Our approach was directly influenced by the hypernym-extractor of CITATION and we provided an analogous summary in Section 1
CITATION shows how to alternate between extracting instances of a class and inducing new instance-extracting patterns
CITATION and CITATION apply bootstrapping to the related task of named-entity recognition
